ratings.notes: proposed_contextual_controlled<TAB>4<TAB>5<TAB>3<TATAB>4<TAB>Short note: This response is contextually relevant and maintains persona consistency, but could be more natural in tone to better reflect the Gatekeeper's strict nature.
